backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing authorization, user profiles, and character sheet storage with defaults and permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing two stock-sheet-related features with involved files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries describing the purpose of various frontend React, utility, and style files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and OKLCH style definitions with light/dark themes and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML page bootstrapping the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level component that switches between LoginScreen and StockSheetPage based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/EditableSheetTab: Editable table component supporting inline quantity editing with validation, formatting, and row add/delete.
frontend/src/components/FinalCalculation: Displays computed stock totals in a styled card with formatted numeric values.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Login screen with Internet Identity sign‑in button and basic layout.
frontend/src/components/SectionCard.tsx: Card wrapper for stock sheet sections showing a title, content slot, and section total.
frontend/src/components/UserMenu.tsx: User menu with sign‑out functionality that clears identity and query cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook creating and managing the authenticated backend actor, auto‑initializing access control and refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient and exposing identity, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useStockSheet.ts: Defines conversions between backend CharacterSheet and frontend StockSheet and exposes React Query hooks for loading and saving stock sheet data.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode colors, and print‑optimized styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for class name merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/StockSheetPage.tsx: Implements the main stock sheet UI with editing, totals calculation, date selection, save, and print functionality.
frontend/src/types/stockSheet.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for stock sheet rows, sheets, and table columns.
frontend/src/utils/dateKey.ts: Provides helpers for generating, formatting, parsing, and validating YYYY‑MM‑DD date keys.
frontend/src/utils/defaultSheetState.ts: Generates default StockSheet arrays with preset item names and quantities.
frontend/src/utils/numberFormat.ts: Offers numeric parsing, validation, formatting, and rounding to three decimal places.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, clearing, and manipulating URL and sessionStorage parameters including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining content paths, theme extensions for colors, typography, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state describing requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented features for a responsive stock calculation sheet web app.
